Title: FoxTube
Description:
This is my first big project. And the first one published in Microsoft Store.
This is a Windows client application for YouTube

Title: MotionDecoder
Description:
This project is used to analyze videos from security cameras and shows short clips which contain detected motions.
I made this projects during scientific projects competition in big data division.
Simple classic game. I made it in Unity just for fun

Title: MiSmartAlarm
Description: Smart alarm app for Xiaomi MiBand

Title: YouTubeScrapper
Description: A C# library which is used to extend the abilities of YouTube API v3

Title: GZipCompression
Description:
Console program which splits files on 1MB blocks and compresses them in multi-thread.
I made this program as intro challange in Veeam Software
